siteMetadata.title: Youtube 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Youtube 上的全球热门视频

blogPost.excerpt:
Surviving Hardcore Minecraft from 100 days all the way up to 400 days was a difficult challenge! But now its time to try and survive 500 days in the hardest difficulty in Minecraft, hardcore mode. I survived 500 days in Minecraft Hardcore and this is what happened!

MY NEW SECOND CHANNEL: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7JPnWgMIpp2YGu4kMu0qpA

Credit to Luke TheNotable for this idea: https://www.youtube.com/user/Creolesbackfire
Discord: https://discord.gg/55pRtC3
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FruTweets
Merch: https://teespring.com/stores/fru-clothing

Music used in this video:

Track: Chime - Lifelong [NCS Release]
Music provided by NoCopyrightSounds.
Watch: https://youtu.be/UDVzaNB0Hso
Free Download / Stream: http://ncs.io/Lifelong
blogPost.body:
Surviving Hardcore Minecraft from 100 days all the way up to 400 days was a difficult challenge! But now its time to try and survive 500 days in the hardest difficulty in Minecraft, hardcore mode. I survived 500 days in Minecraft Hardcore and this is what happened!

MY NEW SECOND CHANNEL: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7JPnWgMIpp2YGu4kMu0qpA

blogPost.title: I Survived 500 Days in HARDCORE Minecraft...
blogPost.author: Fru

localize.title: 我在HARDCORE Minecraft中生存了500天... ...
localize.description:
从100天一直生存到400天的硬核Minecraft是一个艰难的挑战! 但现在它的时间来尝试和生存 500 天在 Minecraft 中最难的难度，硬核模式. 我在Minecraft Hardcore中存活了500天，这就是发生了什么!

我的新第二频道： https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7JPnWgMIpp2YGu4kMu0qpA

这个想法归功于Luke TheNotable：https://www.youtube.com/user/Creolesbackfire。
Discord: https://discord.gg/55pRtC3
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FruTweets
商品：https://teespring.com/stores/fru-clothing

本视频中使用的音乐。

曲目: Chime - Lifelong [NCS Release] Chime - Lifelong [NCS发行]
音乐由NoCopyrightSounds提供。
观看：https://youtu.be/UDVzaNB0Hso
免费下载/流媒体：http://ncs.io/Lifelong

localize.title: 我在HARDCORE Minecraft中生存了500天... ...
localize.description:
從100天一直生存到400天的硬核Minecraft是一個艱難的挑戰! 但現在它的時間來嘗試和生存 500 天在 Minecraft 中最難的難度，硬核模式. 我在Minecraft Hardcore中存活了500天，這就是發生了什麼!

我的新第二頻道： https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7JPnWgMIpp2YGu4kMu0qpA

這個想法歸功於Luke TheNotable：https://www.youtube.com/user/Creolesbackfire。
Discord: https://discord.gg/55pRtC3
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FruTweets
商品：https://teespring.com/stores/fru-clothing

本視頻中使用的音樂。

曲目: Chime - Lifelong [NCS Release] Chime - Lifelong [NCS發行]
音樂由NoCopyrightSounds提供。
觀看：https://youtu.be/UDVzaNB0Hso
免費下載/流媒體：http://ncs.io/Lifelong
